questions.question: What was the reaction of Vīrabhadra when he took the head of Dakṣa's sacrifice?

options.A: He felt great sadness and remorse
options.B: He took it with great anger and threw it into the southern side of the sacrificial fire
options.C: He was indifferent and simply walked away
options.D: He felt great joy and celebrated

questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.26 | QUOTE: 'Vīrabhadra then took the head and with great anger threw it into the southern side of the sacrificial fire, offering it as an oblation'

questions.question: What was the physical appearance of the followers of Lord Śiva?

options.A: They were tall and had fair complexions
options.B: They were of short stature and had bodies like those of sharks, blackish and yellowish
options.C: They were of average height and had dark brown skin
options.D: They were giant-like and had golden complexions

questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.13 | QUOTE: 'Their bodies appeared to be like those of sharks, blackish and yellowish'

questions.question: Who was the personified anger of the Supreme Personality of Godhead?

options.C: The black person who circumambulated Lord Śiva

questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.5 | QUOTE: 'That black person was the personified anger of the Supreme Personality of Godhead'

questions.question: What was the result of the actions of the followers of Lord Śiva?

options.B: They devastated all the arrangements for sacrifice
options.C: They were arrested by the demigods

questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.26 | QUOTE: 'In this way the followers of Lord Śiva devastated all the arrangements for sacrifice'

questions.question: Who arrested Bhṛgu Muni?
questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.17 | QUOTE: 'Maṇimān, one of the followers of Lord Śiva, arrested Bhṛgu Muni'

questions.question: What did the people conjecture about the origin of the storm?

options.A: That it was caused by the wind
options.B: That it was caused by the cows
options.C: That it was caused by plunderers
options.D: That it was a natural phenomenon with no apparent cause

questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.8 | QUOTE: 'There is no wind blowing, and no cows are passing, nor is it possible that this dust storm could be raised by plunderers'

questions.question: What was the purpose of the personified anger of the Supreme Personality of Godhead?

options.A: To execute the orders of Lord Śiva
options.D: To create chaos in the universe

questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.5 | QUOTE: 'He was prepared to execute the orders of Lord Śiva'

questions.question: What did Vīrabhadra do to the sacrificial arena?

options.A: He protected it from the followers of Lord Śiva
options.B: He set fire to the whole arena
options.C: He performed a ritual to purify it

questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.26 | QUOTE: 'After setting fire to the whole arena, they departed for their master's abode, Kailāsa'

questions.question: Who arrested Prajāpati Dakṣa?
questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.17 | QUOTE: 'Vīrabhadra, the black demon, arrested Prajāpati Dakṣa'

questions.question: Where did the followers of Lord Śiva depart to after setting fire to the sacrificial arena?

options.B: The abode of Lord Śiva, Kailāsa

questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.26 | QUOTE: 'After setting fire to the whole arena, they departed for their master's abode, Kailāsa'
